attachments.filename: Bendigo Insurance Brokers Enquiry from - Joel Test.eml

full_threads.body:
Hi Nichole,

Thanks for confirming the DNS records.

No changes have been made on our end recently. We’ve set up SMTP via MailerSend and I’ve just submitted a test email—could you please confirm whether you’ve received it?

Hi Joel

All the records are already there, thanks - however I've been on multiple calls with Maxsum their IT company and no emails are going through now. We had everything working (went to their junk initially) late last week… did something change on your end since? In recent tests I would get a copy on my envest email as well, but those are not coming through either now.

Welcome to call and chat over if easier ?

Thanks,

Nic

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group



Raise a request via the Support Centre



+61 425 699 660



nichole@envest.com.au



Level 7, 545 Queen Street, Brisbane, QLD, 4000

Visit: envest.com.au
Follow us:



This e-mail and any attachments are CONFIDENTIAL and may contain legally privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient of this e-mail message, please telephone or e-mail us immediately, delete this message from your system and do not read, copy, distribute, disclose or otherwise use this e-mail message and any attachments. Although The Envest Group believe this e-mail and any attachments to be free of any virus or other defect which may affect your computer, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and The Envest Group does not accept any responsibility for any loss of damage arising in any way from its use.

Hi Nichole,

Hope you had a great weekend!

We’re currently setting up MailerSend to improve email functionality on the site, and I’d appreciate your help with updating the DNS records for the bendigobrokers.com.au domain.

Could you please forward the following DNS settings to their IT team for implementation?

1. SPF Record (TXT)

Type: TXT
Name / Host: @ (or leave blank depending on your DNS provider)
Value: v=spf1 include:_spf.mailersend.net a:nbn1.bendigobrokers.com.au include:spf.protection.outlook.com include:spf.emailsignatures365.com -all

2. DKIM Record (CNAME)

Type: CNAME
Name / Host: mlsend2._domainkey.bendigobrokers.com.au
Value: mlsend2._domainkey.mailersend.net

3. Return-Path Record (CNAME)

Type: CNAME
Name / Host: mta
Value: mailersend.net

Let us know once these have been updated.

Hi Joel

Hope you had a great weekend.

Nothing is still being received on their end… I'm getting them now as the cc via envest.

We've tried both options now.. sending to .com.au and sending to .com which don't work… there is also an alias setup to send anything received on .com.au to go to the main email .com

Can you help further with what their IT need to sort ?

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group



Raise a request via the Support Centre



+61 425 699 660



nichole@envest.com.au

Hi Joel,

Checking with their IT and will get back to you. Their emails are on .com - so it should be sent 'TO' this.. but it's an alias so we'll see if that fixes delivery.

I had previously updated the 'from' to .com.au, but it's still picking up as spam.

Nichole Valk

Hi Nic,

I hope you are doing well.

We have made updates to the form. Here are the details:

We have submitted a test and would you be able to confirm if you have received it?

Hi Nic,

Thanks for reaching out.

We will look into this today and confirm.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi guys


Would you mind helping please.


Bendigo web form emails have not been going through. I think as the form was set with a .com email initially as the from address, it was why. I've now changed the 'from' email on get a quote to an alias their IT created, info@bendigobrokers.com.au.


Its being received but still picked up as spam. Is there anything on the DNS side you would like them to include so this can be resolved?


Just let me know and will get it sorted with their IT (they are not on our tenancy yet until July).


Thanks,

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group

7/05/2025 4:52 PM-

#### Summary
Website contact form notification

#### Date of change
Thu 8 May, 2025

#### Detailed description of change
Hi guys,

We're having a problem receiving incoming emails from our wordpress website form. Can you please check if these emails are being held up in spam, &/or still being received on your end, and if we need to permission anything in the backend of the form or site to ensure enquiries are received. Welcome to test form to check receipts (set to: info@bendigobrokers.com) from here: https://bendigobrokers.com.au/contact-us/. It could be because the domain (.com.au) is different to the email address which is causing it.

Thanks, Phil.
